text: The Kaliganga River () is a river in Bangladesh. == Early history== The Kaliganga takes off from the Garai just below the Kushtia town and flows straight to the south and enters Jhenaidah subdivision (now district). The mouth of this river is blocked by an embankment of the railway line to Goalundo, providing an alternate mouth further below. Category:Rivers of Bangladesh Category:Rivers of Khulna Division
title: Kaliganga River
